text: What's up everyone? Quick market update. I am going to talk about GME in just a second. I want to talk about a couple other broad market things really fast, specifically. That's exactly what the market shifted today. Because you could tell large caps came down SPX, then if we take a look at the Russell, that blew off the handle to the upside. It had one of its biggest gaps and days, year to date for sure, and in the near term. So the market is starting to pivot a little bit here, and I just think it's important for people to be aware of that. We also saw bonds see a bit of an update here as well, as a lot of folks know I have positions in a lot of the different indices themselves, even TLT, had a pretty significant gap up here. So from a broader perspective outside of the individual product that I typically talk about on the updates here, I do want to let everybody to know that this is happening. So if we look at this from an options pricing as a probability tool standpoint, we can come up with some ideas here. So if we go to this probability analysis, we can see what this might look like for tomorrow. And we can see what the probability of touching some of these different prices are. So if we take a look at the 12th, the probability of touching 2334 is about 16 chance. And then 2777 is about 16. This is a one-standard deviation coin, by the way.
